title: Seerose
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Catering, German, Middle Eastern
description: Jan 2014 reported moved from Mehringdamm 47, Kreuzberg and also removed fish from its menu. Now it's fully vegetarian. Offers daily changing dishes with usually at least two vegan suitable ones. Has organic pastries, pies, and cakes; organic wine and beer; freshly squeezed orange and carrot juice; tea and espresso drinks.
